name: VEGEMITE SHORTAGE CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
name_original: VEGEMITE SHORTAGE CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
description:
Australians Love Vegemite.

But What If They Ran Out Of It?

OH NO!

In This Game You're One Of Many Australians Who Have Woken Up To The News Of There Being No Vegemite, And You Need To Decide What You Do.

Will You Rob Your Neighbour, Go Crazy, Join a Raid, Or Something Else?

Disclaimers:

This Is A Text Based Game, Meaning There are No Visuals Except For Text.

This Was Also Made In 45 Minutes In a Simple Text Programming Language (SmallBasic).

This Was Also Made By Someone Who Doesn't Make Games.
